author: costin
msg: - Moved all initialization under init target.
- Removed Taskdef and property from ProjectHelper - now
it uses normal Tasks to define properties or tasks
- changed replace so it can be used by different tasks ( use
Everything should work as before - all changed are backward compatible.

author: costin
msg: Added Property, Taskdef - to replace the built-in tags.

author: stefano
msg: Shit! sorry for the previous big commit, wrong button.
1) <java> task loads any other java program using reflection
2) <javadoc2> parses source files and can be used with wildcards in package names (org.apache.tools.ant.*)
3)  added the security manager so that exit() doesn't work
4) fixed a number of small cleanups
